title: Fantasy Championship Prep with Heath Cummings (Football 12/20)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports Sr. Fantasy Analyst Heath Cummings to talk about the upcoming championship week in fantasy including lessons learned (2:00), what to do with Keenan Allen and Melvin Gordon (7:30), the Browns could win you a title??? (10:45), concerns over the Jaguars defense (14:00), whether to start Josh Allen (17:00), what to do with Drew Brees and Ben Roethlisberger (19:00), how to handle all the different running backs with injuries (21:00), what to do with Packers players (24:00), Dalvin Cook's upside (26:00), Damien Williams/Spencer Ware situation (28:00), 49ers players a go (31:00) and fantasy strategy in the finals and hedging/splitting the pot (33:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
